CustomBehavior.Title: Missing Settings Plugin
CustomBehavior.Text: We couldn't find the plugin,\n Please make sure you have copied the folder 'WorldQuestSettings' from \Default Profiles\world-quests\Plugin to Honorbuddy 3\Plugins and restart the bot
